title: Super Thursday: what the Bank of England Inflation Report means for you
text: Bank of England Super Thursday: what the Bank of England Inflation Report means for you Allister Heath explains whether an interest rate rise is likely any time soon - and what the Bank's latest Inflation Report means for consumers
